subject: Officiating (Sports)
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Major League Baseball handed a two-game suspension to Fieldin Culbreth, the umpire who incorrectly allowed an illegal pitching change in a game between the Astros and the Angels.
snippet: Major League Baseball handed a two-game suspension to Fieldin Culbreth, the umpire who incorrectly allowed an illegal pitching change in a game between the Astros and the Angels.
